MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:10am. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:11 AM on Monday, 04 January 2021.
